contents.text: Thank you for calling Avenue Code in San Francisco, the leading software consulting agency for end-to-end digital transformation.
For assistance with your current projects, press '1'.
For technical support and issue resolution, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Resolve a production API error that’s blocking our client demo
Troubleshoot deployment issues with the veteran services portal I’m building.
Investigate and resolve intermittent API gateway 502 errors in our production microservices cluster.
I need help troubleshooting an issue in my current project
I’m encountering a deployment error with the data visualization API in my simulation project and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, or account questions, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify an unexpected charge on last month’s invoice
Clarify a charge on the invoice for the veteran job-placement platform we subscribed to.
Clarify the overage billing calculation and SLA credits on last month's cloud infrastructure invoice.
I have questions about a recent invoice and need billing assistance
I need an itemized invoice for last month’s code review services to submit for my research funding reimbursement.

contents.text: For new business inquiries and service information, press '2'.
To speak with a sales representative, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details for a new e-commerce platform project
Discuss pricing and features for a custom digital outreach app for veterans.
Discuss enterprise-grade licensing and integration capabilities for our upcoming API platform deployment.
I want to speak to a sales representative about new digital transformation services
I’d like information on your software development packages for building a machine-learning analysis tool for my physics experiments.

contents.text: To schedule a free consultation on digital transformation solutions, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our consulting team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a consultation to evaluate migrating our legacy systems to the cloud
Arrange a free consultation to plan a digital transformation for my veterans’ assistance nonprofit.
Schedule a technical consultation to architect a cloud-native CI/CD pipeline and containerization strategy.
I’d like to schedule a free consultation to discuss digital transformation options
I want to schedule a free consultation to explore digital transformation solutions for our lab’s data management workflow.
